content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment. Based on my market research, I believe we can agree on a price of 1000 Euros per month. This is a fair and competitive rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this area. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a few questions. Firstly, can you tell me more about the location of the apartment? Secondly, is there a parking space that is included in the rental price? Thirdly, are there any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of?
name: Mary Smith

content: Sure, I'd be happy to provide more information about the apartment and its location. The apartment is located in a quiet and safe neighborhood, with easy access to public transportation, shops, and restaurants. As for parking, I'm afraid there is no designated parking space included in the rental price. However, there are several public parking options nearby that are reasonably priced. As for additional fees or charges, there is a small security deposit that will be due upon signing the lease agreement. This deposit will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that the apartment is left in good condition. Is there anything else you would like to know?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I see. Well, I am willing to rent the apartment. I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month. Can we make this official by signing a lease agreement?

Also, do you have a contract template that I can use to sign the lease agreement? And when do you expect the lease to start?
name: Mary Smith

content: Great to hear that you are interested in renting the apartment! I'm happy to assist you with the lease agreement process. I can provide you with a contract template that you can use to sign the lease agreement. The lease will start on the first day of the next month, so you will have a month to move in and get settled. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns, and I will be happy to help.
name: Heinrich Heine
